root.Summary: 1: Stamatovic SM, Sladojevic N, Keep RF, Andjelkovic AV. PDCD10 (CCM3) regulates brain endothelial barrier integrity in cerebral cavernous malformation type 3:role of CCM3-ERK1/2-cortactin cross-talk. Acta Neuropathol. 2015Nov;130(5):731-50. doi: 10.1007/s00401-015-1479-z. Epub 2015 Sep 18. PubMed PMID:26385474; PubMed Central PMCID: PMC4618087.
